page.title: 02A day in the life of Carol.
page.content: I live in the West End of Haltwhistle. I get up at 7 o'clock in the morning, have my breakfast and get dressed. I come to our{New School with my mum and brother, who is in the nursery. At school I am in the green area. I do number, write stories and paint pictures. At break I play games with my friends. I play the recorder in assembly. I go home at half past three. After school I go to the swimming pool or play out with my friends. We play hopscotch, skipping and "Mams and Dads". On Monday nights I go to the {Brownies.} We do work for our badges, we play games and sing. This year we went to Blyth for the "75 Years of Guiding" celebrations. There were fireworks and a disco.
